name: setup-ssr

schema.title: Generate Angular Universal (SSR) setup for an Angular App
schema.description: Create the additional configuration required to enable SSR via Angular Universal for an Angular application.

project.description: The name of the application to generate the Angular Universal configuration for.
project.x-prompt: What app would you like to generate an Angular Universal configuration for?

main.description: The name of the main entry-point file.

serverFileName.description: The name of the Express server file.

serverPort.description: The port for the Express server.

rootModuleFileName.description: The name of the root module file

rootModuleClassName.description: The name of the root module class.

skipFormat.description: Skip formatting the workspace after the generator completes.

description: Generate Angular Universal (SSR) setup for an Angular application.
